dict.acceptation: 拯救( save的现在分词)；收集；保留；避免；
可取的，保存的；节省的，节约的；补偿的；救助的；

sent.orig: Low temperature, saving conditioning energy, saving energy, saving money and non pollution.
sent.trans: 温度低，节省冷气用电，即节电，又省钱，绿色环保。

sent.orig: Saving power just saving money: power saving rate is 50%, it reduces the whole power using.
sent.trans: 节约电省钱：节电率为50%，降低了照明用电的总电量。

sent.orig: Saving energy, noiseless operation, saving material.
The utility model provides a water-saving shower head, which is capable of saving the water resources.
sent.trans: 本实用新型就是提供一种可以节约水资源的节水淋浴喷头。

sent.orig: And it uses energy saving energy-saving streetlights.
sent.trans: 并且他使用的是节约能源的街灯。
